item.title: Keyple Core
item.description:
1.0.0       Keyple project       Download       GitHub       Changelogs

Overview

The Keyple Core Java component is compatible with PC, MAC and Android platforms.

Documentation

  • Developer guide
  • JavaDoc API

Download

All deliverables are available on the Maven Central Repository.

  • Using Gradle
implementation 'org.eclipse.keyple:keyple-java-core:1.0.0'
  • Using Maven
<dependency>
<groupId>org.eclipse.keyple</groupId>
<artifactId>keyple-java-core</artifactId>
<version>1.0.0</version>
</dependency>
  • Direct download

item.title: Keyple DS Local
item.description:
1.0.0       Keyple project       Download       GitHub       Changelogs

Overview

The Keyple DS Local Java component is the part of the Keyple DS (Distributed System) solution which contains all the local services.

It must be imported and used by the application installed on the terminal having local access to the smart card reader but wishes to delegate all or part of the ticketing processing to a remote application.

It is important to note that it uses and exposes the APIs exposed by Keyple DS Network component.

It is compatible with PC, MAC and Android platforms.

Documentation

  • Developer guide
  • JavaDoc API

Download

All deliverables are available on the Maven Central Repository.

  • Using Gradle
implementation 'org.eclipse.keyple:keyple-plugin-remote-local:1.0.0'
  • Using Maven
<dependency>
<groupId>org.eclipse.keyple</groupId>
<artifactId>keyple-plugin-remote-local</artifactId>
<version>1.0.0</version>
</dependency>
  • Direct download

item.title: Keyple DS Network
item.description:
1.0.0       Keyple project       Download       GitHub       Changelogs

Overview

The Keyple DS Network Java component is the part of the Keyple DS (Distributed System) solution which contains the common network elements used by Keyple DS Local and Keyple DS Remote components.

This library should not be import explicitly because it’s imported by transitivity by the main libraries.

It is compatible with PC, MAC and Android platforms.

Documentation

  • Developer guide
  • JavaDoc API

Download

All deliverables are available on the Maven Central Repository.

  • Using Gradle
implementation 'org.eclipse.keyple:keyple-plugin-remote-network:1.0.0'
  • Using Maven
<dependency>
<groupId>org.eclipse.keyple</groupId>
<artifactId>keyple-plugin-remote-network</artifactId>
<version>1.0.0</version>
</dependency>
  • Direct download

item.title: Keyple DS Remote
item.description:
1.0.0       Keyple project       Download       GitHub       Changelogs

Overview

The Keyple DS Remote Java component is the part of the Keyple DS (Distributed System) solution which contains all the remote plugins.

It must be imported and used by the application installed on the terminal not having local access to the smart card reader and that wishes to control the reader remotely.

It is important to note that it uses and exposes the APIs exposed by Keyple DS Network component.

It is compatible with PC, MAC and Android platforms.

Documentation

  • Developer guide
  • JavaDoc API

Download

All deliverables are available on the Maven Central Repository.

  • Using Gradle
implementation 'org.eclipse.keyple:keyple-plugin-remote-remote:1.0.0'
  • Using Maven
<dependency>
<groupId>org.eclipse.keyple</groupId>
<artifactId>keyple-plugin-remote-remote</artifactId>
<version>1.0.0</version>
</dependency>
  • Direct download
